relation: Darrow - #30 Frankystein's all-too-obvious weakness brings the battle to an abrupt end. Also, Frank has really freaky eyes.

Darrow - #31 Frank gives Ness some insight into Giant Step and sends him on his way. Luckily for Ness, major physical changes to main characters for the sake of comedy return to normal once the joke is done!
Darrow - #32 Ness heads over to the mayor's office to speak with Sherman Hemsley, but instead ends up talking with Pirkle. If you ask me, they picked the wrong person to be mayor.
Darrow - #33 Giant Step awaits! A cameo for the helper mole and a disturbing appearance of the traveling entertainers light up Ness' travel out of Onett and into his first cave.
Darrow - #34 Enemies appear to ruin the journey, but fortunately for Ness, tiny insects are rarely much of a threat.
